snippet.title: DIT IS 4U MET 'BITTER TASTE' – The Next Boy/Girl Band
snippet.description:
4U treedt voor het eerst op in hun uiteindelijke samenstelling: Luca, Tiago, Toon en Jaimy. Ze knallen van het podium met hun eigen single.

snippet.title: Kensington - Sorry (official audio)
snippet.description:
Music: ‘Sorry’, taken from the album ‘Control’

Buy, download or listen here: https://umusicnl.lnk.to/KensingtonControl
 
Facebook – https://www.facebook.com/kensingtonband
Twitter – https://twitter.com/kensingtonband
Instagram – https://www.instagram.com/kensingtonband/
Website – http://www.kensingtonband.com/
 
P&C 2016 Kensington Records, under exclusive license to Universal Music BV

Lyrics
Sorry for the road that I won’t take
For the words that I won’t say
For the love that I won’t give

Sorry for the heart that I won’t show
For the lengths that I won’t go
For the life that you won’t live

Sorry that I opened up my arms
You would never reach in time 
Before they closed again

You will forget
And I won’t remember it
When all I ever did was race in circles
You will forget 
And all there’s left will be
A faded memory
A dream you woke up from

Sorry for the oath that I won’t take
For the vows that I will break
For the role that I won’t play

Sorry that I’m raising up my walls
And whenever you reached over
You are thrown back to the start

You will forget
And I won’t remember it
When all I ever did was race in circles
You will forget 
And all there’s left will be
A faded memory
A dream you woke up from

From the colour I would bring
To ending up again
Opening darkness 
I wanted to hold you back from

http://vevo.ly/b7IUoO

snippet.title: James Arthur - Say You Won't Let Go
snippet.description:
James Arthur 麓Say You Won麓t Let Go麓
out September 9th 2016
Buy the song here      https://smg.lnk.to/sayyouwontletgoEC Listen here on Spotify https://open.spotify.com/track/5uCax9HTNlzGybIStD3vDh
In just a few short weeks  James has made an unbelievable comeback with his new single 麓Say You Won麓t Let Go.麓 Following two years away from the spotlight  the 2012 winner of 麓X Factor麓 has held the #1 spot on the Official Charts for several weeks in the UK  Ireland  Australia  New Zealand and Sweden! James became the first British lead artist to hold the top spot on the chart for more than one week this year  and was also confirmed as the best-selling British singles artist in 2016.  麓Say You Won麓t Let Go麓 has quickly become a worldwide hit  having topped iTunes  Spotify  Shazam and official singles charts around the globe.
 
麓You麓ve got to founder if you麓re scared of your own feelings.麓 Say You Won麓t Let Go tells the moving story of a love  which nearly would麓ve been defeated by fear of permitting emotions. James words the fright of opening up grippingly: 麓I knew I loved you then  but you never know. Cos I played it cool when I was scared of letting go麓 His incomparable voice strikes a chord in the deeply moving ballad as James finds the courage to sing quite frankly of his own life-experiences  which in turn adds much haunting quality to his music. Having spent time in foster care  he sometimes has had difficulties to trust  he says  describing the idea behind 麓Say You Won麓t Let Go麓. Nevertheless  the song also sketches out his career  which still seems to be on the brink of just starting out. Recorded in London and Los Angeles  and co-written with some of the world麓s A-List songwriters and producers  James Arthur麓s new album Back From The Edge (out October 28th 2016) encompasses his experiences over the past few years and reflects his true  honest self. The album also showcases James麓s versatile style  taking inspiration from soul  rock and hip-hop  all while topping pre-order charts around the globe.

Speaking of the album  James added: 麓I am so proud of this album. The past few years have been a bit of a rollercoaster and this album really shows an honest reflection of that. The support so far has been so incredible  and I hope this record will resonate with everyone.麓
 
http://www.jamesarthurofficial.com/
https://www.facebook.com/JamesArthur/
https://twitter.com/JamesArthur23
